name: Health Promotions Program
description: CARECEN's Health Promotions Programs offers Cuerpo Sano workshops, cooking classes, dance and movement classes, early childhood literacy classes, monthly Cuerpo Sano family field trips, dental screenings and fluoride varnish treatments for children birth to 5 years, nutrition and exercise workshops, community building activities and peer support groups. You and Your Family Can Access: - Early childhood literacy classes - Nutrition and wellness workshops - Oral Health Education workshops - Commun
